verses.verse: The hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was on me, <S%H3318><s%> and he brought me out in the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and set me down <S%H5117><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the valley; <S%H1237><s%> and it was full <S%H4392><s%> of bones. <S%H6106><s%>

He caused me to pass <S%H5674><s%> by them all around: <S%H5439><s%> and behold, <S%H3966><s%> there were very many <S%H7227><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> valley; <S%H1237><s%> and behold, <S%H3966><s%> they were very dry. <S%H3002><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> can these bones <S%H6106><s%> live? <S%H2421><s%> I answered, <S%H559><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> you know. <S%H3045><s%>

Again he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H5012><s%> Prophesy over these bones, <S%H6106><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H3002><s%> you dry bones, <S%H6106><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> to these bones: <S%H6106><s%> Behold, <S%H7307><s%> I will cause breath to enter <S%H935><s%> into you, <S%H2421><s%> and you shall live.

I will lay <S%H5414><s%> sinews <S%H1517><s%> on you, <S%H5927><s%> and will bring up flesh <S%H1320><s%> on you, <S%H7159><s%> and cover you with skin, <S%H5785><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in you, <S%H2421><s%> and you shall live; and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as I was commanded: <S%H6680><s%> and as I prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> there was a noise, <S%H6963><s%> and behold, <S%H7494><s%> an earthquake; and the bones <S%H6106><s%> came together, <S%H7126><s%> bone <S%H6106><s%> to its bone. <S%H6106><s%>

I saw, <S%H7200><s%> and, <S%H1517><s%> behold, there were sinews on them, <S%H1320><s%> and flesh came up, <S%H5927><s%> and skin <S%H5785><s%> covered <S%H7159><s%> them above; <S%H4605><s%> but there was no breath in them. <S%H7307><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H5012><s%> Prophesy to the wind, <S%H7307><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> the wind, <S%H7307><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> from the four <S%H702><s%> winds, <S%H7307><s%> breath, <S%H7307><s%> and breathe <S%H5301><s%> on these slain, <S%H2026><s%> that they may live. <S%H2421><s%>

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as he commanded <S%H6680><s%> me, <S%H7307><s%> and the breath came <S%H935><s%> into them, <S%H2421><s%> and they lived, and stood up <S%H5975><s%> on their feet, <S%H7272><s%> an exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> army. <S%H2428><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> these bones <S%H6106><s%> are the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> behold, <S%H559><s%> they say, Our bones <S%H6106><s%> are dried <S%H3001><s%> up, <S%H8615><s%> and our hope is lost; <S%H6><s%> we are clean cut off. <S%H1504><s%>

Therefore prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H5971><s%> I will open <S%H6605><s%> your graves, <S%H6913><s%> and cause you to come up <S%H5927><s%> out of your graves, <S%H6913><s%> my people; <S%H935><s%> and I will bring you into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

You shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I have opened <S%H6605><s%> your graves, <S%H6913><s%> and caused you to come up <S%H5927><s%> out of your graves, <S%H6913><s%> my people. <S%H5971><s%>

I will put <S%H5414><s%> my Spirit <S%H7307><s%> in you, <S%H2421><s%> and you shall live, and I will place <S%H3240><s%> you in your own land: <S%H127><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it and performed <S%H6213><s%> it, <S%H5002><s%> says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came again to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> on it, <S%H3063><s%> For Judah, and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions: <S%H2270><s%> then take <S%H3947><s%> another <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> on it, <S%H3130><s%> For Joseph, the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and for all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions: <S%H2270><s%>
and join <S%H7126><s%> them for you one <S%H259><s%> to another <S%H259><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> that they may become one <S%H259><s%> in your hand. <S%H3027><s%>
When the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> shall speak <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H559><s%> saying, Will you not show us what you mean by these? <S%H5046><s%>

tell <S%H1696><s%> them, <S%H1696><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Behold, <S%H3947><s%> I will take the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> which is in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions; <S%H2270><s%> and I will put <S%H5414><s%> them with it, <S%H6086><s%> even with the stick of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> and they shall be one <S%H259><s%> in my hand. <S%H3027><s%>
The sticks <S%H6086><s%> whereon you write <S%H3789><s%> shall be in your hand <S%H3027><s%> before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Say <S%H1696><s%> to them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H3947><s%> I will take the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from among <S%H996><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> where they are gone, <S%H1980><s%> and will gather <S%H6908><s%> them on every side, <S%H5439><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> them into their own land: <S%H127><s%>

and I will make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> to them all; <S%H5750><s%> and they shall be no more two <S%H8147><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> neither shall they be divided <S%H2673><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> kingdoms any more at all; <S%H4467><s%>

neither shall they defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves any more with their idols, <S%H1544><s%> nor with their detestable things, <S%H8251><s%> nor with any of their transgressions; <S%H6588><s%> but I will save <S%H3467><s%> them out of all their dwelling <S%H4186><s%> places, <S%H2398><s%> in which they have sinned, and will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them: <S%H5971><s%> so shall they be my people, and I will be their God. <S%H430><s%>

My servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> over them; <S%H259><s%> and they all shall have one shepherd: <S%H7462><s%> they shall also walk <S%H3212><s%> in my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and observe <S%H8104><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and do them. <S%H6213><s%>

They shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that I have given <S%H5414><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> in which your fathers <S%H1><s%> lived; <S%H3427><s%> and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein, <S%H1121><s%> they, and their children, and their children <S%H1121><s%>'s children, <S%H1121><s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> shall be their prince <S%H5387><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever. <S%H5769><s%>

Moreover I will make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> with them; <S%H5769><s%> it shall be an everlasting covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them; <S%H5414><s%> and I will place them, <S%H7235><s%> and multiply them, <S%H5414><s%> and will set my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in their midst <S%H8432><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
My tent <S%H4908><s%> also shall be with them; <S%H430><s%> and I will be their God, and they shall be my people. <S%H5971><s%>

The nations <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who sanctifies <S%H6942><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> shall be in their midst <S%H8432><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
